SEARCH
Package service

Class BorowService

java.lang.Object
service.BorowService
public class BorowService extends Object
Service class to handle borrowing books. Responsible for checking book availability, managing fines, and processing borrow requests.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Khadeja and Masa

    Constructor with FineService and LoanService injection.

  • Method Details

    • borowabook

      public void borowabook(String user_id, String book_id)
      Borrow a book for a user. Creates a loan and a fine record.
      Parameters:
      user_id - the user ID as a String
      book_id - the book ID as a String

    • processBorrowRequest

      public String processBorrowRequest(String user_id, String book_id)
      Process a borrow request for a user and book. Checks availability and unpaid fines before borrowing.
      Parameters:
      user_id - the user ID as a String
      book_id - the book ID as a String
      Returns:
      a message indicating the result of the borrow request, or null if an exception occurs
